Wainwright‚àó Pamela Mishkin‚àóChong Zhang Sandhini Agarwal Katarina Slama Alex Ray John Schulman Jacob Hilton Fraser Kelton Luke Miller Maddie Simens Amanda Askell‚Ä†Peter Welinder Paul Christiano‚àó‚Ä† Jan Leike‚àóRyan Lowe‚àó OpenAI Abstract Making language models bigger does not inherently make them better at following a user‚Äôs intent.
